text: The Mayor shall, by June 30th of each year, compile and publish information regarding the relative amount of tax for all major taxes in the District compared with those in surrounding jurisdictions in the Washington metropolitan area and with those in other cities. The information shall include the rate or rates of the property tax levied on residential and nonresidential property, and the effect of major taxes levied on families of different income levels and on businesses.
